heading: About me
paragraphs: Hello ðŸ‘‹I'm a Junior Front-end developer strongly focused on React/React Native apps development, but I can adapt to whatever tools are required.
I currently have several commercial projects under my belt and have already contributed to open-source codebases like Nx. I live in Poland, but I would be happy to work remotely.
When I don't code, you'll find me outdoors. I love being out in nature whether that's going for a walk, biking, reading books or just hanging out with my friends.
